scripts.build: yarn clean:build && yarn build:vue-wrapper && yarn build:subPackages
scripts.build:subPackages: yarn build:subPackages:lib && yarn build:subPackages:typings:testing && yarn build:subPackages:typings
scripts.replace:initialStyles: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_INITIAL_STYLES-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-vue/partials").getInitialStyles())') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s^$regex^$partial^" index.html > index.tmp.html && rm index.html && mv index.tmp.html index.html
scripts.replace:fontLatin: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_FONT_LATIN-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-vue/partials").getFontLinks({ weights: ["regular", "semi-bold", "bold"] }).replace(/https:\/\/cdn\.ui\.porsche\.com\/porsche-design-system/g, "http://localhost:3001"))') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s^$regex^$partial^" index.html > index.tmp.html && rm index.html && mv index.tmp.html index.html
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt
scripts.test:e2e: yarn build-app && TYPE=E2E PORT=5173 jest --colors -c tests/e2e/config/jest.config.ts
scripts.test:vrt: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then yarn build-app; fi && TYPE=VRT PORT=5173 jest --colors -c tests/vrt/config/jest.config.ts
